mapper.sql: t.maintenance_id, t.equipment_id, t.part_id, t.part_quantity, t.reason, t.content, t.maintain_user_id, t.maintain_time, t.create_user_id, t.create_time, t.update_user_id, t.update_time, t.delete_flag,
t.location_id, t.warehouse_id, t.number, t.comments, t.create_user_id, t.create_time, t.update_user_id, t.update_time, t.delete_flag, t.company_id,
t.part_id, t.category_id, t.name, t.spec, t.model, t.unit, t.brand, t.create_user_id, t.create_time, t.update_user_id, t.update_time, t.delete_flag, t.company_id,
t.inventory_id, t.warehouse_id, t.location_id, t.part_id, t.quantity, t.in_task_date, t.create_user_id, t.create_time, t.update_user_id, t.update_time, t.delete_flag, t.company_id,

t.sensor_data_id, t.equipment_id, t.sensor_id, t.string_value, t.number_value, t.boolean_value, t.longitude_value, t.latitude_value, t.create_user_id, t.create_time, t.update_user_id, t.update_time, t.delete_flag, t.company_id,

s.sensor_id, s.equipment_model_property_id, s.salve_id, s.function_code, s.address, s.data_format, s.bit_order, s.period, s.quantity, s.write_number, s.grm_action, s.grm_variable, s.grm_variable_value, s.osh, s.osl, s.ish, s.isl, s.create_user_id, s.create_time, s.update_user_id, s.update_time, s.delete_flag, s.company_id,
t.id, t.alarm_id, t.equipment_id, t.product_line_id, t.alarm_value, t.alarm_status, t.create_user_id, t.create_time, t.update_user_id, t.update_time, t.delete_flag, t.company_id,
t.id, t.alarm_id, t.equipment_id, t.product_line_id, t.alarm_value, t.alarm_status, t.alarm_clear_value, t.create_user_id, t.create_time, t.update_user_id, t.update_time, t.delete_flag, t.company_id,

p.equipment_model_property_id, p.equipment_model_id, p.name, p.label, p.unit, p.address, p.data_type, p.display_type, p.refresh_period, p.create_user_id, p.create_time, p.update_user_id, p.update_time, p.delete_flag, p.company_id,
mapper.select:
select DISTINCT
s.sensor_id, e.equipment_id, d.write_value from eam_equipment_model_properties p left join eam_sensor s on s.equipment_model_property_id = p.equipment_model_property_id left join eam_equipment e on e.equipment_model_id = p.equipment_model_id left join eam_sensor_write_data d on d.equipment_model_property_id = p.equipment_model_property_id AND d.equipment_id = e.equipment_id AND d.delete_flag = 0 WHERE s.delete_flag = 0 AND p.delete_flag = 0 AND e.delete_flag = 0 and e.equipment_id = #{equipmentId} ORDER BY p.equipment_model_property_id ASC
mapper.sql: t.id, t.name, t.lable_name, t.unit, t.data_type, t.equipment_category_id, t.create_user_id, t.create_time, t.update_user_id, t.update_time, t.delete_flag,
mapper.select: select status, count(ticket_id) as count from eam_ticket where delete_flag=0 and company_id=#{companyId, jdbcType=INTEGER} group by status

select plan_id, work_content, next_maintain_date, maintain_frequency_unit, maintain_frequency_quantity, maintain_type, remind_time, a.create_time , uo.name as orgName, ec.name as equipmentCategoryName, e.name as equipmentName from eam_maintain_plan a LEFT OUTER JOIN upms_organization uo ON a.org_id = uo.organization_id LEFT OUTER JOIN eam_equipment_category ec ON a.equipment_category_id = ec.equipment_category_id LEFT OUTER JOIN eam_equipment e ON a.equipment_id = e.equipment_id WHERE a.delete_flag = 0 and a.plan_id=#{planId, jdbcType=INTEGER}

select u.username, u.realname, ar.reject_commont, ar.create_time from eam_ticket_appointed_record ar, upms_user u where ar.order_taker_id = u.user_id and ar.ticket_id =#{ticketId, jdbcType=INTEGER} order by ar.create_time desc
